text:
Raskolnikov stalks Svidrigaïlov, tension thick in the air.

Raskolnikov: “I’m not losing sight of you.”

Svidrigaïlov: “What’s this?” 

---

They face off, measuring each other’s resolve.

Raskolnikov: “You still pursue my sister, don’t you?”

Svidrigaïlov: “What?!”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov follows Svidrigaïlov, suspecting his intentions towards his sister.
